category-def.name: Workbench Base
category-def.label: Workbench Base
category-def.description: The base feature for Tigerstripe. It contains the Model Manager, the generation engine and the headless environment, but no UI. This is suitable to install headless Tigerstripe build servers, or to build your own components on top of Tigerstripes.

category-def.name: End-User Workbench
category-def.label: End-User Workbench
category-def.description: This is the End-User Workbench Feature, including the complete MDD environment including support for modeling, diagrams, content generation, import/export, etc.

category-def.name: Generic Annotations
category-def.label: Generic Annotations
category-def.description: The Generic Annotation Feature, including UI and basic integration for workspace Resources and JDT.
